documents.document: Also looking forward to snowshoeing Monday morning @grousemountain Should be great with all of this new snow!

@grousemountain Hope the winds die down before tomorrow morning so snowshoe clinic proceeds! Missing being on the mountain.

@GoodbyeClutter @Museumofvan Just tired to DM you but wouldn't let me since you don't follow me. I think if you DM me I can then respond.
@YNPLodges Great! I actually will be staying at Old Faithful Inn again in May. Can get information then.
@GoodbyeClutter @Museumofvan I would be happy to accept photos/negs etc being discarded I have scanned approx 20,000 of my family’s photos
@GoodbyeClutter @Museumofvan I wonder how many historical photos/slides/negatives get discarded because no one wants them. So easy to scan
@YNPLodges I’m starting to think about Winter Jan-Feb 2018. When would you likely have your brochures/pricing/reservations available?

Justed booked my Nov/Dec trip to Honolulu on @WestJet Always great staff and service. #PlusSeats @HNLmarathon
@reneritchie Watch rang & actually answered by mistake but worked great. Phone was buried in backpack. Yes, the future is now.
@reneritchie This morning while snowshoeing on @grousemountain my #applewatch rings & I answer my first call. Remarkably good sound.
